title: STATE EMPLOYEES – Amends existing law to provide that executive employees of the state of Idaho shall not be classified employees.
subject: EMPLOYERS AND EMPLOYEES
GOVERNMENT

actions.description: Introduced, read first time, referred to JRA for Printing

Read second time; Filed for Third Reading
